function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of COVID-19 due to aerosol droplets","Impact":"Increased spread and transmission of infection among people","Mitigation":"Utilize negative pressure isolation rooms, exhaust air fans with high-efficiency filters, and increased air change rate","Technologies":"Negative pressure ventilation, high-efficiency micro air filters, air conditioning systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, building managers, HVAC professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of routine disinfection and ventilation in occupied rooms","Impact":"Increased indoor propagation of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement routine disinfection of occupied rooms, increase ventilation, and maintain air change rate","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, routine disinfection protocols","People":"Occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Building managers, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of protective measures (face masks, social distancing)","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promote and enforce the use of face masks, maintain social distancing, and educate people on protective measures","Technologies":"Face masks, social distancing markers, education and awareness campaigns","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers, community leaders"}]}
